name: WebGLRenderingContext.bindRenderbuffer
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.bindRenderbuffer() method of the WebGL API binds a given WebGLRenderbuffer to a target, which must be gl.RENDERBUFFER.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glBindRenderbuffer' in OpenGL ES 2.0.
